citations.citation: Pub. L. 116-6, Div. D, Title VIII

container.heading: Reinstatement of Matching Requirement for Federal Funds Used in Extension Work at the University of the District Of Columbia.

section.text: Section 3(c)(2)(G) of the District of Columbia College Access Act of 1999 (Public Law 106-98; sec. 38-2702(c)(2)(G), D.C. Official Code) is amended—

para.text: in clause (i), by striking "and" after "$1,000,000" and inserting a semicolon;
by inserting "but before school year 2019-2020" after "in or after school year 2016-2017"; and
by striking the period at the end and inserting "; and"; and
by adding at the end the following:

For individuals who begin an undergraduate course of study in or after school year 2019-2020, is from a family with a taxable annual income of less than $500,000. Beginning with school year 2020-2021, the Mayor shall adjust the amount in the previous sentence for inflation, as measured by the percentage increase, if any, from the preceding fiscal year in the Consumer Price Index for All Urban Consumers, published by the Bureau of Labor Statistics of the Department of Labor.

section.text: Except as expressly provided otherwise, any reference to ''this Act'' contained in this title or in title IV shall be treated as referring only to the provisions of this title or of title IV.
This division may be cited as the "Financial Services and General Government Appropriations Act, 2019".
